name: Signature Brows
description: Precision-crafted semi-permanent brows tailored to your face structure. Iggy's signature technique creates hair-like strokes for a natural, elegant look that enhances your features.

name: Volume Lashes
description: Luxurious, lightweight lash extensions for the perfect subtle glamour. Each lash is individually applied for a natural yet striking effect.

name: Million Dollar Facial
description: Comprehensive luxury treatment combining multiple techniques for radiant skin. This signature facial includes deep cleansing, exfoliation, and custom serums for a transformative experience.

name: Lip Blush
description: Enhance your natural lip color with this semi-permanent technique, creating fuller-looking lips with a subtle wash of color. Iggy's precision approach ensures a natural finish.

name: Brow Lamination
description: Reshape and set your brows for a fuller, more defined look that lasts. Perfect for taming unruly brows or creating a more polished appearance.

name: Dermaplaning Facial
description: Expert exfoliation treatment that removes dead skin cells and fine facial hair for incredibly smooth, radiant skin. Includes a luxurious hydrating mask.

name: Full Body Wax
description: Complete hair removal treatment using premium wax formulations for minimal discomfort and lasting results. Includes aftercare instructions.
